Hotel.name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Calgary-Airport, Alberta, Canada

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Homewood Suites by Hilton Calgary-Airport, Alberta, Canada in Calgary, you'll be near the airport and close to Harvest Hills Golf Course and Deerfoot Mall. This hotel is within the vicinity of Aero Space Museum of Calgary and Century Downs Racetrack and Casino.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 122 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and refrigerators. Kitchenettes are outfitted with stovetops, microwaves, and dishwashers. Cable programming and MP3 docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Homewood Suites by Hilton Calgary-Airport, Alberta, Canada. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held on select days.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Homewood Suites by Hilton Calgary-Airport, Alberta, Canada. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held on select days.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Prince's Island Park - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi

The preferred airport for Homewood Suites by Hilton Calgary-Airport, Alberta, Canada is Calgary, AB (YYC-Calgary Intl.) - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
